short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the title of the Star Sports Website. Hide Live scores while watching 5 minutes delayed stream!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the title of the Star Sports Website. Hide Live scores while watching 5 minutes delayed stream! Many viewers complain that the stream is delayed by 5 minutes but the score in the title bar isn't delayed. So this simple extension simply changes the title of the page!
